long_description: Let passing traffic know you're out there with the Amphipod Full-Visibility reflective vest. 3M Scotchlite(TM) high-brilliance reflective material is positioned at the front, back and sides of the vest for 360deg visibility. Polyester mesh construction keeps the vest lightweight and breathable. Front zippered pocket stows energy foods, ID, cash and a house key. Rip-and-stick tabs on the sides adjust the fit of the Amphipod Full-Visibility reflective vest.
short_description: Let passing traffic know you're out there with the Amphipod Full-Visibility reflective vest.
